name: Crosspoint
0:
”Alexa ask Crosspoint to turn on my kitchen light”
”Alexa ask Crosspoint where Greg is”
”Alexa ask Crosspoint for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cross point
Developer Terms of Use
des: Before CrossPoint smart devices were islands, with each product family requiring separate apps, log-ins, setups and workﬂows. CrossPoint is a one-stop solution that connects previously incompatible devices and organizes them into an intuitive system where users can run multi-step operations that unlock the promise of smart devices.
